Continuuity Loom 0.9.5-SNAPSHOT API

Packages
com.continuuity.loom.admin Admin definable entities.
com.continuuity.loom.cluster Cluster and Node objects.
com.continuuity.loom.codec.json Codecs for serializing object to json and deserializing objects from json.
com.continuuity.loom.common.queue Queues implemented on top of zookeeper.
com.continuuity.loom.common.utils Common utilities.
com.continuuity.loom.common.zookeeper Zookeeper utilities.
com.continuuity.loom.common.zookeeper.lib Zookeeper utility libraries.
com.continuuity.loom.conf Configuration constants and defaults.
com.continuuity.loom.guice Dependency injection Guice modules.
com.continuuity.loom.http Http handlers implementing REST endpoints.
com.continuuity.loom.layout Classes related to solving cluster layouts.
com.continuuity.loom.macro This package implements a simple macro expansion.
com.continuuity.loom.management Stats for monitoring and managing the server.
com.continuuity.loom.runtime Classes that can be run with main functions.
com.continuuity.loom.scheduler Schedules threads for solving cluster layouts and planning and coordinating cluster jobs and tasks.
com.continuuity.loom.scheduler.dag Classes for creating and linearizing task DAGs.
com.continuuity.loom.scheduler.task Classes for coordinating tasks and jobs.
com.continuuity.loom.store Persistent stores for admin definable entities, clusters, jobs, tasks, and nodes.
